name: Elementsaber Malo
effectText: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Elementsaber" monster from your hand to the GY; send 1 "Elementsaber" or "Elemental Lord" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Elementsaber Malo". Once per turn, if this card is in the GY: You can declare 1 Attribute; this card in the GY becomes that Attribute until the end of this turn.
